cast.name: 乔恩·邦·乔维 Jon Bon Jovi
艾力克·约翰·萨奇 Alec John Such

this_title: Bon Jovi: Keep the Faith - An Evening with Bon Jovi
introduction: New Jersey rocker Bon Jovi performs a slew of fan-favorites in a combination of acoustic and electric formats. Originally recorded before a live audience for MTV in 1993, among the songs included are "Living on a Prayer," "Wanted Dead or Alive," "Blaze of Glory," "Keep the Faith," and "Little Bit of Soul."With A Little Help From My FriendsLove For SaleLay Your Hands On MeBlaze of GloryLittle Bit of SoulBrother LouieBed of RosesLiving on a PrayerFeverWe Gotta Get Out of This PlaceIt's My LifeWanted Dead or AliveI'll Sleep When I'm DeadBad MedicineKeep The Faith
chinese_title: Bon Jovi: Keep the Faith - An Evening with Bon Jovi
